title: Why does Macy\'s Department Store advertise on Wilmington\'s local stations when there is not a Macy\'s in Wilmington?
text:
The Macy's website shows stores in Fayetteville, Cary and Raleigh,
all within driving distance. Here's a link to the list:
http://www1.macys.com/store/locator/index.ognc?action=locatorSearch&City=ENTER+CITY&State=NOSELECTION&ZipCode=28401



Apparently there was a Macy's in Wilmington for a short time, but it
became a Belk store.
